thread.title: Warren High's dinner theater production set for Oct. 8-10
thread.title_full: Warren High's dinner theater production set for Oct. 8-10 - DailyHerald.com

author: Daily Herald report
title: Warren High's dinner theater production set for Oct. 8-10
text:
Warren Theatre's Dinner Theatre production of "These Shining Lives" by Melanie Marnich is set for 7 p.m. Thursday through Saturday, Oct. 8 to 10, in the Almond Black Box Theater, 34090 Almond Road, Gurnee. Tickets are on sale to the public through showtix4u.com . The tickets cost $6, $4 for students, seniors and children. Through showtix4u.com you can purchase and print out your tickets at home. The Warren Drama Boosters will host a dinner catered by Jimano's before the play at 6 p.m. Oct. 9-10 in theater. Tickets cost $20, $15 for students. Proceeds benefit the school's drama department. Buy dinner tickets at showtix4u.com by Monday, Oct. 5. For details, visit www.d121.org .
 News School Theater Education Warren Township High School
